law.catch_line: Regulations relating to small or small minority businesses.
law.text: The cabinet may promulgate administrative regulations defining standards regarding classifications and definitions of small or small minority businesses as they relate to KRS 45A.670 to 45A.685. These regulations may be adjusted as needed by the secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet in order to insure proper classification of small or small minority businesses.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1990.
